short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Everdroid web recording and playback extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a plug-in for everdroid RPA (http://www.everdroid.cn/) products. It helps to implement automation functions.

1. Record browser operations (click, input, get text, etc.)

2. Playback recording operation

3. Element capture (grab an element and its information from the current page)
